meanings.definition: A resin obtained from the roots of certain plants, used in medicine as a caustic and purgative.
meanings.sent1: The podophyllin was applied to the skin to remove warts.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use podophyllin to treat various skin conditions.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the podophyllin for a tasty treat.
meanings.sent4: Her words had the same effect on him as podophyllin on warts.
meanings.sent5: The podophyllin worked like magic, clearing the skin in no time.

meanings.definition: A drug derived from podophyllin, used to treat genital warts.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacist recommended the podophyllin for treating warts.
meanings.sent2: Podophyllin is effective in combating genital warts.
meanings.sent3: The podophyllin danced off the shelf, eager to help with the warts.
meanings.sent4: His determination was like podophyllin, fighting off obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The podophyllin targeted the warts with precision, leaving no trace behind.
